com.lab111.labwork5
Interface RecordSet

All Known Implementing Classes:
RecordSetImpl
public interface RecordSet

Interface to record set returned by query to table(s). Utilizes 'iterator' pattern for access to particular records.

Author:
freil

Method Summary
 void close()
          Closes the record set reclaiming all associated resources

          Places an iterator to a first record

getFields

FieldInfo[] getFields()
Returns:
information about fields contained in each record

seek

void seek(int recNumber)
          throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
Places an iterator to a record at given index

Parameters:
recNumber - index of record to point to
Throws:
java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - when index is negative or greater than number of records
